message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $120 to you, and we're confident it will meet all your needs. We're offering it to you today for $100. This is a special deal considering its value to you.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'd like to see a bit more flexibility on the price.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your position and are willing to consider a middle ground. Our counteroffer for the product is $95. We hope this aligns better with your expectations while still providing a fair price for our product.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above your target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $92.50. Can you consider this price point?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. We've reviewed your latest offer and appreciate your willingness to compromise. Our counteroffer is $94. We believe this price reflects the value of the product while remaining competitive.

I understand your position, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go down to $92. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to me. Can you meet me at this price?

Thank you for your patience, Bob. After careful consideration, we've decided to adjust our price slightly. Our counteroffer is $93. We hope this meets within your budget while still reflecting the value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above your target. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $91.50. Can you consider this price point?

Thank you for your persistence, Bob. We've evaluated your latest offer and are willing to accept a price of $92.5 for the product. We believe this is a fair compromise that reflects both the value of the product and your budget.
